full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 73 of 236
LC3KMAX2 Alessi - Cross
1 was, correct?
2 A. Well, the boss of what I understand was Mr. Epstein he was the owner.
3
4 Q. Mr. Alessi, the question I asked you was: That's what you testified about who the boss was? Isn't that what I asked you?
5
6 THE COURT: I direct the witness: Can you give the answer and then you can explain. Go ahead.
7
8 A. I could have said this statement at that time.
9 Q. Okay. Thank you, Mr. Alessi.
10
11 It's also true, isn't it, Mr. Alessi, that you understood that whatever Ms. Maxwell was telling you, it was coming from Mr. Epstein, correct?
12
13 A. I don't know the answer. I don't know if it was from him or from herself.
14
15 Q. You're aware that this book that we talked about, the household manual -- we talked about that yesterday, correct?
16
17 A. Yes, sir.
18 Q. Now, that was -- Mr. Epstein hired a countess.
19 Do you recall that?
20 A. Yes.
21 Q. And the countess put together the manual, correct?
22 A. I don't know if she got it or not. I don't know if she was the author of the manual.
23
24 MR. PAGLIUCA: If we can go to 3504-030 page 6, line 24. 3504-030, 6, deposition page 23, lines -- page 24, lines 9
25
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C.
(212) 805-0300
